channel.title: Why do people
channel.description:
Why do people call JaGeX ignorant fags and things like that? Only real reason I can find is that they have successfully made a really good game in Java and are making millions from it, or maybe it's the fact that these guys are really smart, and you are just jealous?
I understand that some people do not like the game runescape, but why insult the creators of such a successful game?
Well, this isn't really a rant or anything, I'm just really curious, why do you all call them fags and gay and shit?

item.dc:creator: @fr33_t0_pk fr33_t0_pk

@fr33_t0_pk wrote:

people get baned for nothing

Read full topic

item.title: Why do people

@pko wrote:

I miss older runescape, but I agree, dey r suces and i r jealous.

Read full topic

item.title: Why do people
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“M0rtion, post:2, topic:85613”]Because they think the graphics are shit, that they never do anything half decent anymore.

I myself agree with you, yes, the graphics are shit, buts its a online game created in javacode. what else can you expect, you need no cd to play it and download barely nothing, there just un-grateful and jelous. ( i cant spell for shit =P)

~Mort[/quote]

Actually, rs graphics where made bad on purpose. WurmOnline is a java game and look at that.

slayer215:

The wilderness ditch, farming, hunting, their parents not paying for them to be rs members because of the violence.

Farming actually reduces the ridiculous price for prayer pots so us “old timers” can spend 1-2 hours at black demons, but oh look, a week in pest control is 500 million gold in prayer pots, and 2-3 weeks at greater demons.

I’ll tell you what’s ruining the game, the shit graphics updates, except for lumby, 11 yr old kids on the game with a 13 yr old limit and freaking chicken suits. I thought the rubber chicken was cool, so did a few friends of mine, zombie heads was pretty good too, scarfs and wooly hats was also cool, egg ring was stupid as it makes the rock ring obsolete, and I didn’t even bother getting the chicken suit.

Jagex want the game to be a fun, safe environment for us to play, some people like the old stuff(me), some people with a mental health disorder that can’t spell like the new buildings, and since there are more people joining the game than old timers staying, the obvious choice would be to keep the new ones happy and fuck the old timers over.

Also, what’s up with the new quests? One every two weeks, one time last year I had every quest done, now I have 1/3 done and more quest points than 1/3 of the RS players, I don’t know what fucking armor is suppose to be good now, I could just stick with barrows but that’s ridiculous to gain unless you spend enough time on RS to know what the hell’s suppose to be good any more.

I joined members roughly a week before the Elemental Workshop quest, before the white line around items when you click them and all the fancy new stuff, it was good back then, with the only problem being, getting Jagex to hear you. Now they don’t listen and simply guess what people want rather than asking them. [/rant]

PS: Old fashion faldor was way better than the new soap-brick city that it is today.

Read full topic

PMGS LIEK I GOT BANNED FRM RS LEIK NOW I HATE JAGex B4 I DIDNT BUT LIEK NOW I DO COZ DEY BAN ME :((((((((

I dont hate jagex, i dont like the game (no i wasnt hacked/scammed/banned/muted)

But its fun calling jagex fags tbh

item.title: Why do people
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Fasih:

jagex has by far to my knowledge made the most massive online multiplayer adventure rpg game! it owns and people who try to hack, use auto programs, have no life! I would say the employees of jagex are doing good and should keep up with it! ;D

Then what on Earth are you doing here? We are a community for cheating.

Although, we say we are, this community is mainly for private servers, face it. Were not doing anything by mean of creating a public bot, other than Cherokee (which everyone seems to have left and let it collect dust).

Read full topic

item.title: Why do people
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

Javacisnotrecognized:

It has to do entirely with maturity. People with low maturity are more likely to enjoy RS, seeing objects they recognize and completing quests which still require mental effort on their part. People slightly more mature then them won’t find much interesting about the game play, although the sociality may keep them there. People who are slightly more mature than that will most likely hate the game for having stupid graphics, and being full of people less mature than themselves.

Dang…

Read full topic

Because every single thing is hated by people.

some doesnt because they get banned for no reason or they just don’t like the graphics.
